Detailed Description

Class to read in files.

This class reads in Orca files that have been saved to disk.

size_t ORFileReader::Read ( char *  buffer,
size_t  nBytesMax 
) [virtual]

Read attempts to place up to nBytesMax of bytes into buffer. This function must be implemented by derived classes. Returns the number of bytes actually read

Implements ORVReader.

Reimplemented in ORIgorFileReader.
